thread.title: S & T Bancorp Sees Large Volume Increase (STBA)
thread.title_full: S & T Bancorp Sees Large Volume Increase (STBA)

title: S & T Bancorp Sees Large Volume Increase (STBA)
text:
Health S & T Bancorp - Get News & Ratings Daily Enter your email address below to get the latest news and analysts' ratings for S & T Bancorp with our FREE daily email newsletter: S & T Bancorp Sees Large Volume Increase (STBA) Posted by Leena Rodriguez on Sep 19th, 2015 // No Comments 
Shares of S & T Bancorp (NASDAQ:STBA) saw an uptick in trading volume on Friday , Marketbeat reports. 1,594,076 shares traded hands during trading, an increase of 767% from the previous session’s volume of 183,880 shares.The stock last traded at $31.29 and had previously closed at $31.09. 
A number of brokerages have commented on STBA. Zacks lowered S & T Bancorp from a “buy” rating to a “hold” rating in a report on Tuesday, August 11th. RBC Capital increased their price objective on S & T Bancorp from $29.00 to $32.00 and gave the company a “sector perform” rating in a report on Wednesday, July 22nd. Keefe, Bruyette & Woods increased their target price on S & T Bancorp from $31.00 to $33.00 and gave the stock an “outperform” rating in a research report on Wednesday, July 22nd. Finally, Piper Jaffray initiated coverage on S & T Bancorp in a research report on Thursday, June 4th. They issued an “overweight” rating on the stock. Five analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and one has given a buy rating to the company. The stock currently has an average rating of “Hold” and an average price target of $32.00. 
The firm has a market cap of $1.09 billion and a P/E ratio of 16.35. The stock has a 50 day moving average price of $30.26 and a 200 day moving average price of $29.17. 
S & T Bancorp (NASDAQ:STBA) last posted its earnings results on Tuesday, July 21st. The financial services provider reported $0.52 EPS for the quarter, topping analysts’ consensus estimates of $0.48 by $0.04. The company earned $62.20 million during the quarter, compared to the consensus estimate of $59 million. During the same period last year, the firm posted $0.49 EPS. Analysts expect that S & T Bancorp will post $2.04 EPS for the current fiscal year. 
The business also recently announced a dividend, which was paid on Thursday, August 20th. Shareholders of record on Thursday, August 6th were given a $0.18 dividend. The ex-dividend date of this dividend was Tuesday, August 4th. 
In other S & T Bancorp news, Director James Thomas Gibson sold 75,000 shares of S & T Bancorp stock in a transaction that occurred on Thursday, July 23rd. The shares were sold at an average price of $32.54, for a total value of $2,440,500.00. The transaction was disclosed in a filing with the Securities & Exchange Commission, which is available at the SEC website . 
S&T Bancorp, Inc. ( NASDAQ:STBA ) is a bank holding company. The Company operates through its wholly owned subsidiaries, including   S&T operates   which   deposits,   services; Wealth Management, which offers   deeds, guardian and custodian of employee benefits and other trust and brokerage services, as well as a registered investment advisor that manages private investment accounts for individuals and institutions, and Insurance, includes an insurance agency offering commercial property and casualty insurance, group life and health coverage, employee benefit solutions and personal insurance lines.
